configurations.name: LaceworkConfig

processes.name: Change Target Bucket ACL via Object
Print Target Bucket Name
processes.description: only once for the target bucket that will be used.

processes.name: Change Target Bucket ACL via CLI
processes.description: only once for the target bucket that will be used.

processes.name: Send Statistics
processes.description: Send information about total number of S3 buckets that will be remediated, ignored and that are configured to be ignored.
